channel.title: Log on not working
channel.description: sorry if this is the wrong section, but every time i log onto a server with the downloaded moparscape client, it works for about 1 second. after that, all of the characters get messed up and the game freezes. any help please?

item.title: Log on not working
item.dc:creator: @swing68 swing68
item.description:
@swing68 wrote:

i saw this… but the servers that even say they work with moparscape don’t work. i can use other clients to play their servers, but i would like to try some of the other servers. thanks
